attributes.action: investigate how producers can manufacture bio - degradable toiletries, refill at the supermarket and recycle plastic containers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Flushable, reuseable or recyclable shampoo bottles, shaving foam containers, washing up liquid and tampon applicators would be much more environmentally - friendly - the petitioner is calling on the British govt to investigate possible ways to produce these.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
